subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: The American midfielder Stuart Holden, who has missed six months because of a knee injury, is set to play for the first time since last season, suiting up Tuesday for Bolton’s reserves in a game against Fulham’s reserves.
snippet: The American midfielder Stuart Holden, who has missed six months because of a knee injury, is set to play for the first time since last season, suiting up Tuesday for Bolton’s reserves in a game against Fulham’s reserves.
